(Is this post right? I really don't like use DH, I just was using my 
snake)

Najah fell far of Horn dril and didn't lose time and stand up his 
snake-like body, he spat his saliva towards Horn Drill. One of his 
shoot fell in a rock that burns (His Salive was acyd!).
 
Without lost time, Najah changed at Robot mode  again and in his back 
appears a couple of rockects. So he took of and he started to shot at 
Horn Drill while he turned around his enemy.
